main.name: Yuva Phalle
main.bio: Highly motivated and results-oriented cybersecurity professional with a Master’s degree in Information Security and 3+ years of Coding experience using various Technologies including technical sales. Skilled in client consultation, solution customization, and sales strategy development. Proven ability to build strong relationships and deliver exceptional customer support. Currently working at Hacking Lab as Cyber Security Technical Sales Consultant.

education.degree: Master of Computer Science and Software Engineering
Master of Science in Information Security

work.title: Cyber Security Technical Sales Consultant
work.description: Client Consultation, Solution Customization, Sales Strategy Development, Relationship Building, Product Knowledge, Sales Presentations, Negotiation, Customer Support, Market Research

work.title: Lead Hacking-Lab Challenge Developer
work.description: Challenge Development: Conception, development and integration of new cyber security challenges. Testing: Quality control of own, existing and third-party security challenges. Implementation of remote or on-site capture-the-flag events and cyber security training. Sales and project management. Support Hacking-Lab users via Discord, Chat, Mail or Jira. Recording videos of walkthroughs and hacking tutorials.

work.company: Schaffhausen Institute of Technology / Constructor Group
work.title: Master’s Startup Thesis
work.description: Developed a comprehensive car parking sharing solution named SpotLot. Designed and implemented a user-friendly platform for efficient parking space sharing. Conducted market research and identified opportunities for parking solutions.

work.company: Schaffhausen Institute of Technology / Constructor Group
work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: Cyber Protection: TA for Cyber Protection coursework covering Cryptography, Android Security, Fuzzing, Access Control.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
